mapper.insert: INSERT INTO srm_demo.srm_supplier_tax_risk_case(publish_time, case_type, department, taxpayer_name, supplier_name) values (#{publishTime}, #{caseType}, #{department}, #{taxpayerName}, supplier_name)

INSERT INTO srm_demo.srm_supplier_operate_risk(ID, PUT_DATE, PUT_REASON, CREATE_TIME, PUT_DEPARTMENT, REMOVE_DEPARTMENT, REMOVE_DATE, REMOVE_REASON, SUPPLIER_NAME) VALUES (#{id}, #{putDate}, #{putReason}, #{createTime}, #{putDepartment}, #{removeDepartment}, #{removeDate}, #{removeReason}, #{supplierName})
